parameter.name: logon_script
parameter.description: A script that will execute every time a user logs on. Two environment variables are set: USERNAME, and ACCESS_TOKEN. The ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable is an access token for the MS Graph. The token scope config option sets the comma-separated scopes that should be requested for the ACCESS_TOKEN. ACCESS_TOKEN will be empty during offline logon. The return code of the script determines how authentication proceeds. 0 is success, 1 is a soft failure and authentication will proceed, while 2 is a hard failure causing authentication to fail.
